text: i'm a medical doctor originally trained
in mexico
and i have a degree in
public health i worked for a large
medical device company doing operations
training i worked for a private equity
firm based in london i was working at
goldman sachs for most of the last four
years i worked in digital advertising
before i came here in boston my most
recent job was in product management i
also have a non-profit in kenya that
focuses on providing computer computing
access and computing education i grew up
in pakistan i went to school there i'm
an engineering major
right after school i started working for
an oil company before i came to hps i
was in finance mainly focused on
healthcare companies
i really wanted to transition from an
engineering and manufacturing type role
into more of a commercial
strategic role trying to acquire the
structure from the business setting but
then applying it to my own project my
main motivation for coming here was
trying to figure out or try to see a way
that i could experiment without boxing
myself in coming into hbs i was hoping
to learn a little bit more about
other functions potentially other
industries so
looking to make a potential change from
what i was doing before i decided to
come to hbs because i wanted to learn
more about leadership the reason i've
come to hbas is that i want to explore
the business world and i want to
transition out of like a specific needs
sector like oil services into a broader
sector
and i still haven't figured out what
that would be but i'm hoping that my
time here can help me do that
